de.jhit.opendiabetes.vault.processing.filter

Class ContinuousWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jhit.opendiabetes.vault.processing.filter.Filter
      • de.jhit.opendiabetes.vault.processing.filter.ContinuousWrapper

  • public class ContinuousWrapper
extends Filter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected long marginInMinutes 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContinuousWrapper(Filter filter, int marginInMinutes)
      Filter subclass, gets a filter and uses the timeSeries of the internal FilterResult, together with a margin value in minutes, on the initial List of VaultEntrys and returns only entries located in these time spans
      ContinuousWrapper(java.util.List<Filter> registeredFilter, int marginInMinutes)
      Filter subclass, gets a List of Filters and runs them similar to DataSlicer, uses the timeSeries of the last internal FilterResult, together with a margin value in minutes, on the initial List of VaultEntrys and returns only entries located in these time spans

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FilterResult filter(java.util.List<VaultEntry> data)
      Check if the given List of VaultEntrys matches the criteria of the Filter.
      protected java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> normalizeTimeSpans(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> timeSeries)
      Gets a series of time spans and merges overlapping spans according to the marginInMinutes value set in the constructor

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • marginInMinutes

        protected long marginInMinutes

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContinuousWrapper

        public ContinuousWrapper(java.util.List<Filter> registeredFilter,
                         int marginInMinutes)
        Filter subclass, gets a List of Filters and runs them similar to DataSlicer, uses the timeSeries of the last internal FilterResult, together with a margin value in minutes, on the initial List of VaultEntrys and returns only entries located in these time spans
        Parameters:
        registeredFilter - Filter(s) which provide the results for the time spans
        marginInMinutes - time range applied to the resulting time spans of registeredFilter

      • ContinuousWrapper

        public ContinuousWrapper(Filter filter,
                         int marginInMinutes)
        Filter subclass, gets a filter and uses the timeSeries of the internal FilterResult, together with a margin value in minutes, on the initial List of VaultEntrys and returns only entries located in these time spans
        Parameters:
        filter - Filter which provides the results for the time spans
        marginInMinutes - time range applied to the resulting time spans of registeredFilter

    • Method Detail

      • normalizeTimeSpans

        protected java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> normalizeTimeSpans(java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date>> timeSeries)
        Gets a series of time spans and merges overlapping spans according to the marginInMinutes value set in the constructor
        Parameters:
        timeSeries - time spans to be merged
        Returns:
        merged time series
